title: Baby Carrier Panel
description: two seamed panels; small scale batik pattern--blue on off-white with ocassional pink, green and yellow embroidery; lower panel--large rectangle with swirling patterns surrounded on three sides by multi-linear border; upper panel--two squares surrounded by linear bands; across top--small floral pattern; sides have sewn on edges of blue
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
